title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4118.9 - Restraints on racing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4118.9 - Restraints on racing

State Regulations

No track may enter a contract that restricts the
appearance of a horse at any other track, except that a track, in consideration
for transportation afforded to participate in an international championship
race may bind a horse to appear and start (if at all) at its track only for
such race and a period of 10 consecutive days prior to and 15 consecutive days
subsequent to such race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4118.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
